sampler management.

ensure that the parameters passed in are valid.

add a new sampler.

try to bind the user sampler. If we can't, then simply return ~0.

set the sampler's name and texture stage data.

return the handle.

Member Data Documentation

const unsigned int GrAfterEffect::kMaxSamplerCount = 8 [static]

units 0..7 are for use by the effect. Units after that are reserved by the system.
